comments.body: Attached test container servlet for the wrong bug, please ignore ;)
This now links to the online docs.

description:
In the Tomcat 5.0 page, http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-5.0-doc/, 
clicking on the "JK Documentation" link in the left column wants to go to 
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-5.0-doc/coyote/jk2/index.html, but 
nothing is found there.
